translations: [气象] 自动记录式气压计

sentences.sentence: STUDY SELECTION:All the datum that involved in pedography, sole barograph, force plate and force platform, sole pressure and in-shoe plantar had been selected, totally 263 piece papers were collected.
sentences.translation: 资料选择：凡属涉及利用足印技术、足底压力扫描技术、力板与测力台技术、压力鞋与鞋垫技术都被纳入选择范围，共收集相关论文263篇。
